head.title: Aunt Sarah's Apple Mint Ice Cream

directions.step:
~- (Makes 1 1/2 quarts)
Cut chocolate into small pieces. Add to milk and heat until chocolate is melted, beating occasionally to blend the chocolate with the milk . Cool. Whip egg white and jelly together until stiff. Add to chocolate milk, mixing thoroughly. Add mint Flavoring and fold in whipped cream. Stir mixture thoroughly and chill. Freeze.
